# SQLite Amalgamation
#
# Required for the SQLite backend. Not needed for PostgreSQL-only builds.
# Run from the repository root:

mkdir -p vendor/sqlite
curl -o sqlite3.zip https://www.sqlite.org/2026/sqlite-amalgamation-3510200.zip
unzip -jo sqlite3.zip "*/sqlite3.c" "*/sqlite3.h" -d vendor/sqlite
rm sqlite3.zip

# Source: https://www.sqlite.org/download.html
